WhitePaperICO.Subject: Quigig White Paper
WhitePaperICO.Body:
Welcome to

QuiGig

Hello @@@UserEmail,

Thank you for your interest in QuiGig. Please Click here to download our White Paper

Have a Quigi day!
QuiGig

PurchaseCoinbase.Subject: @@@Subject
PurchaseCoinbase.Body:
QuiGig

Hello @@@ToUserName

Thank you for your support!

Your Quig balance will be updated within 24 hours.

PurchaseConfirm.Subject: @@@Subject
PurchaseConfirm.Body:
QuiGig

Hello @@@ToUserName

Your Purchase is Confirmed!

Congrats! You have just bought @@@CoinVal Quigs on QuiGig.com

Where are my Quigs?

Your Quigs will reside in your Quig wallet on QuiGig.com. They are protected by encryption. If you want to learn more about safety on QuiGig, check out our Privacy Policy.

What can I do with my Quigs?

You can of course hold onto them like a traditional investment, but unlike most other digital investments, you are able to use them right away to get gigs done on the QuiGig platform. Our platform is built to connect you with the perfect person who can help you fix your house, babysit your kids, teach you karate, or anything else you can think of!

You can do all of this from your QuiGig dashboard. Go there now!

What’s next?

There will be many more updates about QuiGig, including both platform improvements and Quig value changes. Things on the near horizon are:
Quig Marketplace Implementation
Direct On-Platform Payment Processing
Mobile App Beta Launch

Stay Tuned and Keep in Touch!

WelcomeEmail.Subject: Welcome to QuiGig
WelcomeEmail.Body:
(Optional) This text will appear in the inbox preview, but not the email body.






Welcome to   







Thank you for joining our platform. We hope that whatever you are looking for, whether its more work, more money, or some help on a project, you find the right person to help you out!

As a token of our appreciation, we have given you 500 free Quigs, just for signing up
What Are Quigs?

Quigs are the essential platform currency used to perform actions on our site. You can use this free balance to place order, place bids, and view additional information about projects. Still not sure?



Visit our FAQ
Each month that you use QuiGig, your Quig balance will return to 500, ensuring that you can use our site each month at little cost to you!

  Buy Additional Quigs
What do I do Now?

Before getting any gigs on QuiGig, you must first build your profile, you can add as much or as little information as you want, but it is advised that you fill that sucker up. If you are unsure about what to add, we have written a blog just for you .



  Visit Your Profile
Jump Right In!

Technically, you are all set to start submitting offers and bids on gigs. You have the Quigs for it, and if you have any questions about how the service works, you can email us or check out the blog where we have walked you through alot of our differentiators. Have fun and we’re looking forward to you getting gigs done quick!

ForgotPassword.Subject: QuiGig Account Reset Password.
ForgotPassword.Body:
Welcome to

QuiGig

Hello @@@UserName,

QuiGig just received a request to reset your password.
In order to reset your password, please login with below password.

Your new password is: @@@UserEmailCode


If you did not request your password to be reset please ignore this email and your password will stay as it is.

This email is automatic generated and should not be replied back.

Thanks Regards,
QuiGig

WelcomeGoogleFB.Subject: QuiGig Account
WelcomeGoogleFB.Body:
Welcome to

QuiGig

Hello @@@UserName,

Your account has been created successfully on QuiGig.
Now you can directly login with QuiGig

This email is automatic generated and should not be replied back.

Thanks Regards,
QuiGig

VerifyAccount.Body:
Welcome to

QuiGig

Welcome to QuiGig In order to get started, you need to confirm your email address

Your confirmation code is: @@@UserEmailCode



This email is automatic generated and should not be replied back.

Thanks Regards,
QuiGig
